hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT PD.Id, PD.FIRST_NAME, PD.LAST_NAME, GD.GENDER_NAME, PD.AGE, PH.PHONE_NUMBER, EM.EMAIL_ID, TM.TEAM_SHORT_NAME, TM.TEAM_FULL_NAME, POS.POSITION_TITLE_NAME, PT.PROFILE_TYPE_NAME, AD.STREET_VALUE, AD.DISTRICT_NAME, ST.STATE_NAME, AD.PINCODE, PD.DATE_OF_BIRTH FROM personal_details pd LEFT OUTER JOIN GENDER GD ON GD.ID=PD.GENDER_ID AND GD.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM TM ON TM.ID=PD.TEAM_ID AND TM.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN POSITION_TITLE pos ON POS.ID = PD.POSITION_TITLE_ID AND POS.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PROFILE_TYPE pt ON PT.ID = POS.PROFILE_TYPE_ID AND PT.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ADDRESS AD ON AD.PERSON_ID = PD.ID AND AD.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN STATE ST ON ST.ID=AD.STATE_ID AND ST.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN COUNTRY CO ON CO.ID = ST.COUNTRY_ID AND CO.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PHONE PH ON PH.PERSON_ID = PD.ID AND PH.IS_ACTIVE=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN EMAIL EM ON EM.PERSON_ID=PD.ID AND EM.IS_ACTIVE=1 WHERE PD.IS_ACTIVE=1
